targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", resource="memory", unit="byte", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, cluster)

sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, cluster) / on (pod, cluster) sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", resource="memory", unit="byte", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, cluster) * 100
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", resource="cpu", unit="core", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, cluster)

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (pod, cluster) / on (pod, cluster) sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", resource="cpu", unit="core", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, cluster) * 100
count(kube_pod_info{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node"}) by (cluster, node, pod, pod_ip, host_ip)
